long_description: Combining wind-blocking fabric with a moisture-wicking grid fleece for warmth, the Patagonia Adze hoodie jacket for women fends off chilling wind to keep you warm and dry during cold-weather outings. Polartec(R) Windbloc(R) stretch-woven polyester soft-shell fabric stops wind; Durable Water Repellent finish resists precipitation. Grid fleece backer warms you and wicks moisture. Two-way-adjustable hood with a microfleece-lined neck and wind flap for next-to-skin comfort. Low-profile rip-and-stick cuff closures and a drawcord hem seal out cold and lock in heat. The women's Patagonia Adze hoodie jacket features harness- and pack-friendly hand pockets and an internal zip chest pocket, all with smooth, reverse-coil zippers.
short_description: Combining wind-blocking fabric with a moisture-wicking grid fleece for warmth, the Patagonia Adze hoodie jacket for women fends off chilling wind to keep you warm and dry during cold-weather outings.
